thought: The user is inquiring whether failing to comply with a summons or order from an assessment officer constitutes an offense under the Petroleum Income Tax Act, B.E. 2514, Section 75. The answer clearly states that it is indeed an offense and provides the relevant legal basis. The answer is straightforward and includes the necessary legal context, making it easy to extract the main point without additional rationale.
answer: มีความผิดตาม พระราชบัญญัติภาษีเงินได้ปิโตรเลียม พ.ศ. 2514 มาตรา 75
